attributes.action: Change the way UK Citizens enter USA.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government or Parliament to do it because there is a new Administration who reflects values & equality for all. Our kinship with the USA is invaluable & the tourism the USA gets from UK Citizens is phenomenal.
attributes.background: Currently USA Citizens enter the UK on Egates hassle free & very quickly. Please debate if we can have this reciprocated when we arrive in the USA for UK Citizens. Currently we stay in lengthy & time consuming queues. It needs to be balanced & equal for both countries.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for the US Government to decide.

You could start a petition asking the Government to seek to negotiate different travel/entry arrangements if that's what you'd like to see happen.
